config.title: Short Videos (Legal Content).
config.description: We recently produced and uploaded a new short video discussing Teleworkers’ Rights and Obligations under Mexican Law on our Justia YouTube Channel.

config.title: Justia Mexico Portal Content Updates.
config.description: We have recently enriched our portal's growing collection of updated laws by updating the content of the General Law of Commercial Companies, Income Tax Law, Public Security System Law, and National Code of Criminal Procedures.

config.title: QA Automation Team.
config.description: We've enhanced our web accessibility libraries to include ADA Compliance checks in our automated QA reports. Moreover, our system now enables seamless interaction with Google Docs, offering a more user-friendly interface for QA reports.

config.title: Justia Portal.
config.description: We've launched a new Justia subdomain, car-accidents.justia.com, which will serve as the dedicated hub for all of our car accident consumer content.

config.title: Justia Mexico Portal.
config.description: We’ve been working tirelessly to strengthen and maintain the content on our Justia Mexico Portal, ensuring it remains up-to-date. This month, we've published pages on ISR Law, Commercial Companies Laws, the National Public Security System General Law, and the Penal Procedures Code.

config.title: IT Team.
config.description: This month, we accomplished several IT operations, including a mass upgrade to our application databases infrastructure, a security enhancement for some of our Legacy Elevate Websites, and various server maintenance tasks.
